entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:13 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
